name: AVARUUS
description:
INTRO

AVARUUS is an old school space shooter game project that was started in 2006. Other major development sprints occurred in 2008 and in 2010 but the game was never finalized until 2018.

After a long period of inactivity in the development the game was nearly lost forever - but luckily it was found and could be released with some newly added features and fixes.

The game was programmed with CoolBasic which was already outdated technology-wise when the development of AVARUUS began. Get ready for a blast from the past! Enjoy!

HOW TO PLAY

AVARUUS is a multiplayer game for 2-3 players. Players fight against each other in an open space arena using weapons, tools and other items on their way to victory. The last man standing will win the round. The player with most round victories will win the match and claim the fame.

CONTROLS

The game can be played with the keyboard or a gamepad. Player controls can be configured in the settings menu.

The game supports Xbox 360 controllers only. Consider using a controller emulator for non-supported gamepads.

PERFORMANCE

This game uses DirectX 7.0. Game performance cannot be fully guaranteed on operating systems released after Windows XP.

  • Recommended OS: Windows XP (or newer)
  • Minimum OS: Windows 98
